name: ecv-data-access
summary: This package is a proof of concept for accessing data across multiple scientific disciplines. The requests are structured around the ECV (Essential Variable) vocabulary: [https://vocab.nerc.ac.uk/collection/EXV/current/](https://vocab.nerc.ac.uk/collection/EXV/current/). The package was developed during the EnvriHub Next hackathon in Amsterdam and is funded by the EnvriHub Next (EHN) project.
